name: Shoot Duffer Shoot
description:
Shoot Duffer is an arcade game where you hold a gun and shoot those stupid and ugly looking stones flawing from sky each stone has a differ health bar & each gun has differ in damage.

Its the game is in development process but currently has 4 different maps and 4 different guns and contain 25 progress levels more maps,guns & levels will be added in future updates

As i mention its Indevelopment so there is a high chance of facing bugs & glitches.Please be humble and support me by reporting the bugs so i can fix them in future updates 

                                              THANKS FOR VISITING THIS PAGE.
